Trial_Design.evidence: 165 patients scheduled for VRS were randomly assigned

Intervention.evidence: AoA-guided GA combined with IPA at a single dose of 1 g of paracetamol (acetaminophen) or 2.5 g of metamizole or both

Objective.evidence: we assessed the impact of preemptive analgesia with COX-3 inhibitors

Method_Outcome.evidence: impact of preemptive analgesia with COX-3 inhibitors, administered alongside GA with AoA-guided IROA, on the incidence of PONV, oculocardiac reflex (OCR), and oculoemetic reflex (OER)

Randomisation_Allocation.evidence: patients scheduled for VRS were randomly assigned

Number_Randomised.evidence: 165 patients scheduled for VRS were randomly assigned

Result_Outcome.evidence: PONV in 4%, OCR in 10%, and OER in 0% of the 153 analyzed patients

Harms.evidence: PONV was observed in 2.11% (3/142) of patients
